channel.title: Cache help!
channel.description: kk so the webclient downloads the cache properly and everything but instead of extracting all the files into the same CACHE folder it makes another folder inside the main folder and then the client dosent find it :S please help me so when it downloads Cache.zip that it extracts to the same folder where the rest of the docs are instead of making a new one inside it with the same name

item.title: Cache help!
